00015 template <class _Traits> class mfOffReader : public mfReader<_Traits>
00016 {
00017 public:
00018         typedef typename _Traits::space space;          
00019         typedef typename _Traits::ids ids;              
00020         typedef typename _Traits::sVertex sVertex;      
00021         typedef typename _Traits::sCell sCell;          
00022         typedef typename _Traits::sMesh sMesh;

00045 template <class _Traits> bool mfOffReader<_Traits>::read(sMesh* malha, const char *filename)
00046 {
00047         MF_ASSERT(filename);
00048         MF_ASSERT(malha);       
00049         
00050         ifstream pf(filename);
00051         
00052         if( pf.is_open())
00053         {
00054                         if(! reader(pf, malha))
00055                                 return false;
00056                 
00057                         pf.close();
00058         }
00059         else
00060                 return false;
00061         
00062         return true;
00063 }
00064 
00065 template <class _Traits> bool mfOffReader<_Traits>::reader(ifstream &pf, sMesh* malha)
00066 {
00067         char auxstr[255];
00068         space coords[3];
00069         sCell cell;
00070         int i, nv, j, nc, k, idnv;
00071         ids auxvtx[cell.getNumberVerticesInCell()];
00072 
00073         MF_ASSERT(auxstr);
00074         
00075         while( (! pf.eof())&&(strcmp(auxstr,"OFF") != 0) )
00076                 pf >> auxstr;
00077         
00078         if(! pf.eof())
00079         {
00080                 pf >> nv;
00081                 pf >> nc;
00082                 pf >> k;
00083 
00084                 MF_ASSERT(nv > 0);
00085         
00086                 for (i=0; i<nv; i++)
00087                 {
00088                         for(j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00089                                 pf >> coords[j];
00090 
00091                         malha->addVertex(coords);
00092                 }
00093 
00094                 MF_ASSERT(nc >= 0);
00095 
00096                 //cout << "Vertices Lidos" << endl;
00097 
00098                 for (i=0; i<nc; i++)
00099                 {
00100                         pf >> idnv;
00101                 
00102                         MF_ASSERT(idnv <= cell.getNumberVerticesInCell());
00103                 
00104                         for (j=0; j < idnv ; j++)
00105                         {
00106                                 pf >> k;
00107                                 MF_ASSERT((k >= 0)&&(k < nv));
00108                                 auxvtx[j] = k;
00109                         }
00110                         for(j=idnv; j < 4; j++)
00111                         {
00112                                 auxvtx[j] = -1;
00113                         }
00114 
00115                         //cerr << "c " << i << " " << auxvtx[0] << " " << auxvtx[1] << " " << auxvtx[2] << " " << auxvtx[3] << endl;
00116 
00117                         malha->addCell(auxvtx);
00118                 }
00119                 //cerr << "Celulas Lidos" << endl;
00120         }
00121         else
00122                 return false;
00123                 
00124         return true;
00125 }
00126 
00127 }
